page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: Most people are meat eaters,although there is a growing number of vegetarians.Meat, fish, or poultry is usually just eaten at the main meal of the day,either at midday, or early evenings.A typical days menu might be as follows : Breakfast : cereal made of wheat or rice, with milk and sugar. Toast,butter,marmalade. Tea or coffee with milk and perhaps sugar. Lunch : sandwiches, made from or brown bread,filled with perhaps cheese,jam or meat Also 1 or 2 of these :_ fruit,yoghurt,biscuits Dinner : A meat,fish or poultry dish with 2 or 3 vegetables.Sweet dish made of fruit, with cream.
